content: skill level beginner red heart® soft yarn 2 1/2 ounces no 4608 wine or no 9518 teal crochet hook 5 5mm us i-9 optional 3/4 yard of 1/2 elastic cut elastic to head measurement plus 1/2 overlap ends of elastic by 1/2 and sew together fold single_crochet band in half over circle of elastic and slip_stitch in place
